archimate:Assessment.name: Lack of skills
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Any organisation, newly formed or a bulwark, can suffer from a lack of skill in "open source" tooling, whether that's actually open source (like Apache Druid) or might be (like Java).
Game Analytics, when they chose Apache Druid, had a lack of knowledge when implementing JVM systems and of data pipelines built with NoSQL.
